hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Professional dog boarding and care services designed around your companion's unique needs. Every service begins with understanding your dog's personality and preferences.

services.title: Complimentary Assessment Visit
services.description: Every relationship starts with getting to know each other. During this no-cost visit, we meet your dog in a relaxed setting, understand their personality, preferences, and any special needs.

services.title: Overnight Boarding
services.description: Your dog stays with us in our home environment, receiving personalized care, regular exercise, and plenty of love. Daily updates and photos keep you connected while you're away.

services.title: Day Visits & Socialization
services.description: Perfect for busy days or when your dog needs extra exercise and socialization. Drop-off and pickup times that work with your schedule.

services.title: Special Needs Care
services.description: Senior dogs, dogs with medical conditions, or those requiring extra attention receive specialized care tailored to their unique requirements.

steps.title: Book Assessment
steps.description: Schedule your complimentary assessment visit to meet us and let your dog get comfortable.

steps.title: Personalized Plan
steps.description: We create a detailed care plan based on your dog's personality, needs, and preferences.

steps.title: Booking Made Easy
steps.description: Schedule your dog's stay with confidence, knowing they'll receive personalized, loving care.

steps.title: Stay Connected
steps.description: Receive daily updates and photos so you can relax knowing your companion is happy and safe.

guarantee.title: Our Promise to You
guarantee.description: We're so confident in our care that we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your dog's experience, we'll work to make it right or provide a full refund.
